body_html: @gyang274 is there an integration test for tensorflow, which installs latest cuda cudnn automatically from Nvidia and tries to compile TF 1.8 with it? if so it would have failed on any linux platform without cudnn steps I had outlined above.

body: @gyang274 is there an  integration test for tensorflow, which  installs latest cuda cudnn automatically from Nvidia and tries to compile TF 1.8 with it? if so it would have failed on any linux platform without cudnn steps I had outlined above.
